name: BreastRadExistanceCS
title: Breast Radiology Existance Value
description: Breast Radiology codes to define existance of a value

concept.definition: Value was observed and is present.

concept.display: Value was found to be not present
concept.definition: An observation for the value was made and found to not be present.

concept.display: No attempt was made tt observe value
concept.definition: An observation for the value was not made. Its existance is indeterminate.
